alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Washington; Westmoreland (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 28 at 2:47PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT EAST CENTRAL WASHINGTON...SOUTHWESTERN WESTMORELAND AND NORTHWESTERN FAYETTE COUNTIES... At 247 PM EST, snow showers were located near Canonsburg, moving southeast at 30 mph. Locations impacted include... Canonsburg, Monessen, California, Donora, Monongahela, Charleroi, McGovern, Bentleyville, New Eagle, North Belle Vernon, Wickerham Manor-Fisher, Baidland, North Charleroi, Houston, Speers, Belle Vernon, Lynnwood-Pricedale, Eighty Four, Fayette City, and Allenport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 25 and 45. Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 39 and 46. Rapid onset of quick accumulations and recuded visibilities in snow remain possible. Motorists should exercise caution if traveling through the area.
